X.i.5.B.3.b
.
Effects of Privacy Restrictions
Since logbooks contain information relating to many individuals that may be of a personal nature, they are subject to privacy restrictions.Â  Therefore, entries that relate to medical or disciplinary matters concerning individuals other than the subject of the inquiry may be deleted by NARA.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B - Obtaining Merchant Marine Service Records
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B
